subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Women's Rights
Philanthropy
lead_paragraph: Shannon Galpin, the founder of a nonprofit organization that aids women in conflict zones, noticed she was the only woman cycling in Afghanistan. She has set out to change that.
snippet: Shannon Galpin, the founder of a nonprofit organization that aids women in conflict zones, noticed she was the only woman cycling in Afghanistan. She has set out to change that.
